```{r, echo = FALSE, message = FALSE}
library(ggplot2)
library(ggExtra)
```

```{r removeGrid, cache = TRUE}
if (requireNamespace("ggplot2", quietly = TRUE)) {
  df <- data.frame(x = 1:50, y = 1:50)
  p <- ggplot2::ggplot(df, ggplot2::aes(x, y)) + ggplot2::geom_point()
  p + removeGrid()
  p + removeGrid(y = FALSE)
  p + removeGridX()
}



```
